WSUS33 KKCI 192355 
SIGW  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET...NONE 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 200155-200555 
FROM 50E BAM-DBL-50W ALS-60N LAS-50E BAM 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.

WSUS31 KKCI 192355 
SIGE  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 28E 
VALID UNTIL 0155Z 
SC GA CSTL WTRS 
FROM 150SSE ILM-200SE CHS-140SE CHS-150S ILM-150SSE ILM 
AREA EMBD TS MOV FROM 27040KT. TOPS TO FL410. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 200155-200555 
FROM 110ESE SIE-190ESE ECG-130SSE ILM-210ENE PBI-MIA-60NW 
PIE-80SSW CEW-30W BWG-ILM-50SE SBY-110ESE SIE 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.

WSUS03 KKCI 192205 
CHIV WS 192205 
SIGMET VICTOR 1 VALID UNTIL 200205 
SIGMET  
MO IL IN PA OH LE 
FROM ERI TO AIR TO TTH TO SGF TO BUM TO 40NW BVT TO ERI 
OCNL SEV TURB BTN FL210 AND FL310. DUE TO WNDSHR ASSOCD WITH 
JTST. CONDS CONTG BYD 0205Z.
